headline: CrowdStrike Named One of the Top 25 Workplaces in the World in 2025
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, November 17, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced it has been named to Fortune World’s Best Workplaces™ in 2025 by Great Place To Work® and Fortune magazine, recognizing CrowdStrike as one of only 25 companies worldwide honored for its exceptional culture and leadership. With 98% of employees proud to tell others they work at CrowdStrike, this recognition underscores the company’s commitment to its mission, its people, and the innovation that leads cybersecurity in the
